t:
Once five chocolates for just one buck,
Now one chocolate costs five, oh luck!
From simple joys to grown-up setup,
In this shift, yes, we grew up.

                                                         cont...
c:
Once five chocolates for just one buck,
Now one chocolate costs five, oh luck!
From simple joys to grown-up setup,
In this shift, yes, we grew up.

When toys would break and tears would flow,
In heartache's wake, we came to know,
The pain of love, the sting of breakup,
In these trials, yes, we grew up.

Hide and seek in childhood's park,
Now we hide feelings in the dark.
From open hearts to feelings bottled up,
In this change, yes, we grew up.

Fairy tales once filled our dreams,
Now news headlines make us scream.
From magic lands to reality's abrupt,
In this transition, yes, we grew up.

Begging mom for ten more minutes,
Now alarms ring, no limits.
From cozy beds to early wakeup,
In this routine, yes, we grew up.

Dreamed of flying, free and high,
Now we fly, but in suit and tie.
From dreams of flight to business trips nonstop,
In this journey, yes, we grew up.

Once wished to grow, to be so tall,
Now wish for youth, most of all.
From eager growth to wishing time would backup,
In this realization, yes, we grew up.

Growing up, it came so fast,
In the blink of an eye, our childhood passed,
We've grown up, it's plain to see,
Even before we knew, it came to be.



#growingup #childhood #transition #nostalgia #life #change #time #realization
